article.title: Chenega to Provide Outpost Surveillance Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Chenega Logistics Limited Liability Company, Sioux Falls, South Dakota, was awarded a $19,916,911 firm-fixed-price contract for the procurement of five integrated Combat Outpost Surveillance Force Protection Systems, spare parts, technical data packages, and support services.Â The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Orlando, Florida, is the contracting activity.
